item.description:
No Limit Texas Hold 'Em Tournament at Mitch's in Hartford. Beginners are welcome. It's a $20 buy in with no rebuys or addons. Please bring an extra $1.00 to pass along to Nina for Meetup website fees as well. A couple of snacks and soda will be provided, but feel free to also bring along a snack. BYOB.  This is a ONE-table tournament so PLEASE:  If you RSVP and then find you can't attend, change your RSVP as soon as possible so someone can take your place.  If we have 8 players, the payouts will be $80, $50, and $30.

We'll start with 1000 worth of chips.  Blinds will start at 10-20 and go up every 20 minutes.

Feel free to email me with any questions!  Looking forward to seeing you there!

Note:  The starting time for this tournament is 7 PM, not 7:10 or 7:30. Please be on time. Feel free to arrive any time after 6:30. Please don't arrive at 7:10 and expect to play unless you've called ahead to say you'll be late. In other words, if you're not here AT 7:00 and I haven't heard from you (or been able to reach you), I WILL assume you're not coming.  It's really NOT that hard to pick up the phone and keep us posted.

If you've never played before, don't hesitate to come!  First, because the best (and really only) way to get comfortable with tournament poker is to DO IT!  Second, because we're a very friendly group and we'll be patient with you as you pick up the basics.  Third, because, as a beginner, experienced players will find you very unpredictable.  This makes you a viable threat, and you may even end up winning!
item.how_to_find_us: I'll send parking instructions and further info to "yes" RSVPs a few days before the event.

group.name: The CardBoard Players Club of Connecticut

item.name: Texas Hold 'Em at Ken's (Change of Venue!)
